docs.snippet: The subject was pickup lines, and Germany's "Mr. Flirt" offered a few examples to his class of Syrian and Iraqi refugees. "I really love the scent of your perfume," he suggested. "You have a beautiful voice." He invited his students to take a stab...
docs.lead_paragraph: The subject was pickup lines, and Germany's "Mr. Flirt" offered a few examples to his class of Syrian and Iraqi refugees. "I really love the scent of your perfume," he suggested. "You have a beautiful voice." He invited his students to take a stab.

headline.main: Germany's 'Mr Flirt' Teaches Refugees How to Pick Up Women
headline.print_headline: Germany's 'Mr Flirt' Teaches Refugees How to Pick Up Women
